SLController - Class in <Unnamed>

SLView - Class in <Unnamed>
SLView defines a GUI interface that can be used as a user interface for a variety of programs.
SLView(String) - Constructor for class SLView
This constructor creates a view that does not include the button grid.
SLView(String, int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class SLView
This constructor includes a button grid.
